name: Orange Island
description:
Orange Island is being designed and developed by Ted Sterchi as a completely authentic
8-bit experience.



  • An engaging 5-hour story adventure about family, friends, hope, bravery, corruption, and our impact on the environment told via cutscenes and brief conversations
  • Five playable characters with unique magical abilities and stats
  • 8-bit graphics, audio, and gameplay authentic to the NES
  • A pastel pixel art style with numerous areas to explore
  • Engaging platforming puzzles
  • Open-world side-scrolling exploration with towns, inns, shops, and many side-quests to be found and completed
  • Diverse characters and themes created by a queer developer
  • No loot boxes or gambling junk 👏
